00007 #ifndef _litesql_except_hpp
00008 #define _litesql_except_hpp
00009 #include <iostream>
00010 #include <string>
00011 #include "litesql/utils.hpp"
00014 namespace litesql {
00016 class Except  {
00017 private:
00018     std::string msg;
00019 public: 
00020     Except(std::string m)  : msg(m) {}
00021     friend std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, Except &e) {
00022         os << e.msg;
00023         return os;
00024     }
00025 };
00027 class NotFound : public Except {
00028 public:
00029     NotFound(std::string s="") : Except("NotFound: "+s) {}
00030 };
00032 class DatabaseError : public Except {
00033 public:
00034     DatabaseError(std::string m) : Except("DatabaseError: "+m) {}
00035 };
00037 class SQLError : public Except {
00038 public:
00039     SQLError(std::string m) : Except("SQLError: "+m) {}
00040 };
00042 class InternalError : public Except {
00043 public:
00044     InternalError(std::string m) : Except("InternalError: " +m) {}
00045 };
00047 class MemoryError : public Except {
00048 public:
00049     MemoryError(std::string m) : Except("Allocation failed: "+m){}
00050 };
00052 class InsertionError : public Except {
00053 public:
00054     InsertionError(std::string m) : Except("Database full: "+m){}
00055 };
00057 class UnknownError : public Except {
00058     // handles the rest
00059 public:
00060     UnknownError(std::string m) : Except("UnknownError: "+m){}
00061 };
00062 
00063 
00064 }
00065 #endif
